scripts.firstTime: npm install && npm run installGlobals && npm run installLibraries && npm run buildDev && npm run createDatabase && npm run db-refresh
scripts.createDatabase: node _setup/CreateDatabase create ebay && node_setup/CreateDatbase create ebay_test
scripts.db-real: knex migrate:rollback && knex migrate:latest && node seeder rs real
scripts.db: npm run db-rollback && npm run db-migrate && npm run db-seed
scripts.post-receive: npm install && bower install --allow-root && gulp build && pm2 restart app
